name: Sticky Frog
description:
You're a frog - and after some gruesome kitchen experiments you find your tongue with special sticky powers. It seems you can now connect different objects with each other by shooting parts of your tongue. It is time to execute your escape!

Controls:

  • Move: w, a, s, d
  • Jump: spacebar
  • Shoot tongue: left click
  • Release tongue: left click
  • To connect two objects, shoot at them quickly
  • To climb at the wall, shoot it!
